pages.title: Irrealium
pages.text: Irrealium is material from interworld dimension, that can be found near reality breakthrough points.
Irrealium it self is perfect material for interworld machinery. Your scientific automata can craft many machinery blocks for you.

pages.title: Irrealium casing
pages.text: Base casing block for irrealium machine! Can be used in any place of machine

pages.title: Irrealium glass
pages.text: Transparent casing block for irrealium machine! Cannot be used on corners of machine
